title: Arvato commissions first solar power plant in the USA - DC Velocity
summary: A logistics center installed 1,160 solar panels generating over 800,000 kWh of green electricity annually, significantly reducing emissions and costs, with a goal to reach carbon neutrality by 2030.
green_innovation: TRUE, The installation of solar panels to generate green electricity significantly reduces emissions and aligns with environmental sustainability goals.
business_innovation: TRUE, The introduction of solar panels as a new process for generating green electricity is a business innovation as it differs significantly from the firm's previous practices.
green_product: FALSE, The article discusses the installation of solar panels for electricity generation, which is a service rather than a tangible product designed to reduce environmental impact throughout its life cycle.
green_process: TRUE, The adoption of solar panels for electricity generation is a green process as it minimizes environmental impacts, reduces energy consumption, and cuts emissions.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 221114, Solar Electric Power Generation; 493110, General Warehousing and Storage; 238210, Electrical Contractors and Other Wiring Installation Contractors; 551114, Corporate, Subsidiary, and Regional Managing Offices
greenwashing: FALSE, The article demonstrates a genuine effort by Arvato to implement sustainable practices and reduce environmental impact, rather than engaging in greenwashing.

title: How Mattiq Uses Data and AI to Advance The Electrolyzer Technology, and Interview with Hydrogen Central - Hydrogen Central
summary: The article discusses how Mattiq leverages data and AI to advance electrolyzer technology, focusing on decarbonization and sustainable chemical and fuel production, particularly clean hydrogen production through innovative materials design and accelerated stress testing.
green_innovation: TRUE. This is green innovation as it focuses on decarbonizing fundamental building blocks, especially in clean hydrogen production, leading to reduced carbon footprint and increased use of renewable resources.
business_innovation: TRUE. This is business innovation as the article highlights how Mattiq introduces new materials design and development methods using AI for more efficient and sustainable chemical and fuel production processes.
green_product: FALSE. The article mainly focuses on materials design and chemical process innovations rather than a specific final product.
green_process: TRUE. The article emphasizes the development of green processes in manufacturing and operational activities by minimizing environmental impacts and promoting sustainability through streamlined materials design and deployment.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 541715 - Research and Development in the Physical, Engineering, and Life Sciences, 325180 - Other Basic Inorganic Chemical Manufacturing, 325199 - All Other Basic Organic Chemical Manufacturing, 334516 - Analytical Laboratory Instrument Manufacturing
greenwashing: FALSE. The article focuses on genuine advancements in materials design and sustainable production processes, without any indication of misleading environmental claims or greenwashing tactics.
